# bcR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Grab the latest data from the Peruvian Central Bank using R.

## Installation

You can install the development version of bcR from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("JulioCollazos64/bcR")
```

## Example

Search data about inflation:

```{r example-1.1}
library(bcR)
metadata_tbl <- get_bcrp_metadata()
metadata_tbl
subset(metadata_tbl, grepl("InflaciÃ³n", `Nombre de serie`))
```

Let's look at some statistics:

```{r example-1.2}
inflation_data <- get_bcrp_data(
  codes = "PN01296PM",
  from = "2010-01",
  to = "2025-01"
)
inflation_data$values <- as.numeric(inflation_data$values)
inflation_data
summary(inflation_data)
```
